trans-unit.source: Creates typed versions of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> for more efficient serialization.
trans-unit.target: Cria versões escritas o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>para serialização mais eficiente.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"></xref> class that is used to serialize the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma derivação do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"> </xref> classe que é utilizado para serializar o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>a serialização.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class that is specifically created to serialize the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Uma derivação do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>classe que está a ser criada especificamente para serializar o tipo especificado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"></xref> class using an object that maps one type to another.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma derivação do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"> </xref> classe utilizando um objeto que mapeia um tipo para outro.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> that maps one type to another.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>que mapeia um tipo para outro.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>

trans-unit.source: A derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class that is specifically created to serialize the mapped type.
trans-unit.target: Uma derivação do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>classe que está a ser criada especificamente para serializar o tipo mapeado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"></xref> class that is used to serialize the specified type and namespace.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma derivação do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"> </xref> classe que é utilizado para serializar o tipo especificado e o espaço de nomes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>a serialização.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The default namespace to use for all the XML elements.
trans-unit.target: Espaço de nomes predefinido a utilizar para todos os elementos XML.

trans-unit.source: A derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class that is specifically created to serialize the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Uma derivação do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>classe que está a ser criada especificamente para serializar o tipo especificado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"></xref> class that is used to serialize the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma derivação do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerFactory"> </xref> classe que é utilizado para serializar o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: If a property or field returns an array, the extraTypes parameter specifies objects that can be inserted into the array.
trans-unit.target: Se um campo ou propriedade devolve uma matriz, o extraTypes parâmetro especifica objetos que podem ser inseridos na matriz.

trans-unit.source: Calling this overload is similar to calling the [XmlSerializer(Type, Type\[\])](assetId:///M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.Type[])?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) to create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga ao chamar é semelhante ao chamar o [XmlSerializer (tipo, tipo\[\])](assetId:///M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.Type[])?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) para criar uma instância de <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>a serialização.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> array of additional object types to serialize.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>matriz dos tipos de objeto adicionais para serializar.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: Uma derivação do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class that can serialize objects of the specified type into XML documents, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma derivação do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>classe pode serializar objetos do tipo especificado em documentos XML e vice versa.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Each object to be serialized can itself contain instances of classes, which this overload can override with other classes.
trans-unit.target: Cada objeto a ser serializado próprio conter instâncias de classes, que pode substituir esta sobrecarga com outras classes.

trans-unit.source: Calling this overload is similar to calling the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%28System.Type%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides%29> to create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga ao chamar é semelhante ao chamar o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%28System.Type%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides%29>para criar uma instância de <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%28System.Type%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>a serialização.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> that contains fields that override the default serialization behavior.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>que contém campos que substituem o comportamento de serialização predefinido.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: A derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: Uma derivação do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class that can serialize objects of the specified type into XML documents, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma derivação do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>classe pode serializar objetos do tipo especificado em documentos XML e vice versa.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Specifies the object that represents the XML root element.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o objeto que representa o elemento raiz XML.

trans-unit.source: Calling this overload is similar to calling the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%28System.Type%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute%29?displayProperty=fullName> to create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga ao chamar é semelhante ao chamar o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%28System.Type%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute%29?displayProperty=fullName>para criar uma instância de <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%28System.Type%2CSystem.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>a serialização.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> that represents the XML root element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute>que representa o elemento raiz XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: Uma derivação do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class that can serialize objects of the specified type into XML document instances, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma derivação do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>classe pode serializar objetos do tipo especificado para instâncias do documento XML, e vice versa.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Each object to be serialized can itself contain instances of classes, which this overload can override with other classes.
trans-unit.target: Cada objeto a ser serializado próprio conter instâncias de classes, que pode substituir esta sobrecarga com outras classes.

trans-unit.source: This overload also specifies the default namespace for all the XML elements, and the class to use as the XML root element.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga também especifica o espaço de nomes predefinido para todos os elementos XML e a classe para utilizar como o elemento raiz XML.

trans-unit.source: Calling this overload is similar to calling the [XmlSerializer(Type, XmlAttributeOverrides, Type\[\], XmlRootAttribute, String)](assetId:///M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides,System.Type[],System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute,System.String)?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) to create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga ao chamar é semelhante ao chamar o [XmlSerializer (tipo de tipo, XmlAttributeOverrides,\[\], XmlRootAttribute, String)](assetId:///M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides,System.Type[],System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute,System.String)?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) para criar uma instância de <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Type>a serialização.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> that contains fields that override the default serialization behavior.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>que contém campos que substituem o comportamento de serialização predefinido.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> array of additional object types to serialize.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>matriz dos tipos de objeto adicionais para serializar.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> that represents the XML root element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute>que representa o elemento raiz XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The default namespace of all XML elements in the XML document.
trans-unit.target: Espaço de nomes predefinido de todos os elementos XML no documento XML.

trans-unit.source: A derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: Uma derivação do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Returns a derivation of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class that can serialize objects of the specified type into XML document instances, and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma derivação do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>classe pode serializar objetos do tipo especificado para instâncias do documento XML, e vice versa.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Each object to be serialized can itself contain instances of classes, which this overload can override with other classes.
trans-unit.target: Cada objeto a ser serializado próprio conter instâncias de classes, que pode substituir esta sobrecarga com outras classes.

trans-unit.source: This overload also specifies the default namespace for all the XML elements, and the class to use as the XML root element.
trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga também especifica o espaço de nomes predefinido para todos os elementos XML e a classe para utilizar como o elemento raiz XML.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>que expande ou substitui o comportamento da classe especificado no parâmetro de tipo.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> array of additional object types to serialize.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>matriz dos tipos de objeto adicionais para serializar.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> that defines the XML root element properties.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute>que define as propriedades de elemento raiz XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The default namespace of all XML elements in the XML document.
trans-unit.target: Espaço de nomes predefinido de todos os elementos XML no documento XML.

trans-unit.source: The path that specifies the location of the types.
trans-unit.target: O caminho que especifica a localização dos tipos de mensagens em fila.

trans-unit.target: Uma derivação do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.target: Esta sobrecarga também especifica o espaço de nomes predefinido para todos os elementos XML e a classe para utilizar como o elemento raiz XML.

trans-unit.source: Calling this overload is similar to calling the [XmlSerializer(Type, XmlAttributeOverrides, Type\[\], XmlRootAttribute, String, String, Evidence)](assetId:///M:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides,System.Type[],System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute,System.String,System.String,System.Security.Policy.Evidence)?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=False) to create an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class.
